title: Generic methodology to prevent food contamination by soil born legacy POPs in free range livestock
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Farida Amutova, Matthieu Delannoy, Araylym Akhatzhanova, Nurlan Akhmetsadykov, Gaukhar Konuspayeva, Stefan Jurjanz
